answer:

question:
####[NISEI](http://nisei.net) [NISEI Rules Team Update]
If the Runner plays Divide and Conquer with an [Aumakua](/en/card/12104) installed, how many times does Aumakua trigger?
answer:
Aumakua will trigger up to three times, once for each server breached with no cards trashed or stolen.

Updated (2022.05).
